useCase.name: Manage Dataset Creation with Exploration
useCase.description: System allows a user to create a dataset with exploration enabled

successEndConditions.condition: Dataset creation with exploration enabled is successful

failureEndConditions.condition: Dataset creation fails due to exploration issues
